verses.text:
\w Defend|strong="H8199"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w blameless|strong="H8537"\w*; \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trusted unswervingly:

Examine \w me|strong="H3820"\w*, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w test|strong="H5254"\w* \w me|strong="H3820"\w*; \w test|strong="H5254"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* governs \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1980"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w worthless|strong="H7723"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* companied \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w dissemblers|strong="H5956"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* knaves, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* would \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*;

\w but|strong="H3068"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w innocence|strong="H5356"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w march|strong="H5437"\w* \w round|strong="H4196"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

singing \w loud|strong="H8085"\w* songs \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w thanks|strong="H8426"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w telling|strong="H5608"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* love \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* lives.

Do \w not|strong="H5315"\w* gather \w me|strong="H5315"\w* up \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w*; slay \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w people|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*,

whose \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w stained|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* villainy, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* whose \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*.

But \w my|strong="H6299"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* is \w blameless|strong="H8537"\w*! \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*, \w be|strong="H2603"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w stands|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H3068"\w* ground, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w choirs|strong="H5975"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
